name: Handball 16
description: Play with all your favourite players in THE handball simulation. Use all the real handball moves and tactics and challenge other players online.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows®7 / Windows®8 / Windows®10 64 bits Processor: AMD Phenom™ 9850 @2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT / AMD Radeon™ 6570 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows®7 / Windows®8 / Windows®10 64 bits Processor: Intel® Core i5 4570 @3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 750Ti / AMD Radeon™ R7 265 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space

reviews.review_text: FInally a game that on that sport that deserves more visibility.  Sensations are good even if it's true that it's not a 100% simulation. But the fun is here and I enjoy playing. It reminds me when I used to play Handball :P.
I'm very glad to play with my favourite team. I hope this game will the first of a long serie !
